item.title: The Bare Your Sole 2016 barefoot walkathon is scheduled to take place in Singapore this September
item.description:
Source: Habitat for Humanity Singapore. “Bare Your Sole,” the annual barefoot walkathon organized by Habitat for Humanity Singapore, returns to raise funds and awareness for those in need within Singapore. Now in its tenth year, the event will be held at OCBC Square on September 10th at 7:30 am. The 2.5km and 5km charity walkathon will benefit Project HomeWorks, a local initiative dedicated to improving the living situations of the elderly, ill, and disabled individuals facing challenging conditions across Singapore...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-bare-your-sole-2016-barefoot-walkathon-is-scheduled-to-take-place-in-singapore-this-september/

item.title: Registration is now open for the Bare Your Sole walkathon
item.description:
Source: Habitat for Humanity. Habitat for Humanity Singapore’s yearly walkathon, Bare Your Sole, is back for its seventh year on May 30th. This event unites individuals from all backgrounds to highlight the challenges faced by those living in poverty who lack access to basic necessities like shelter and shoes. The funds gathered from the 2km and 4km barefoot walkathon will support Habitat for Humanity Singapore’s Project HomeWorks program. This local initiative focuses on enhancing the living situations of seniors, individuals with illnesses, and those with physical disabilities residing in one-room apartments in Singapore...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/registration-is-now-open-for-the-bare-your-sole-walkathon/
